item.title: Episode 300 - Happy, Joyous, and Free - The Murder of Tim Smith
item.description:
On a warm March night in Ocala, Florida, a quiet household settles into its familiar routine. A movie plays. The lights go out. Nothing feels out of place. By morning, that sense of normalcy is gone.

Join us, as we examine the disappearance and murder of Tim Smith, a man known for stability, kindness, and devotion to his family. What begins inside the safety of home slowly unravels into a haunting mystery... Feed: https://audioboom.com/channels/5096973.rss

item.title: The Pomp and Joe Show 1-14-2026
item.description: The full Pomp and Joe Show, with Bob Pompeani, Joe Starkey, and Austin Bechtold (behind the glass), from Wednesday, January 14th, 2026 Feed: https://rss.amperwave.net/v2/feed/audacy/pittsburgh_kdkafm-the_joe_starkey_show
